reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a bed and breakfast in someone’s pretty two up two down cottage (with added bathroom and kitchen) just outside the village of Nenthead.
reviews.title: Like staying in a strangers house

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We’d had a heavy day of cycling over 50 miles and wanted to get in and relaxed before heading out into the village to eat. Unfortunately, when we’d put our bikes in the shed, we were told rather abruptly as we were about to ascend the stairs to take our shoes off before stepping on the carpet. If I was dripping wet or if we were wearing walking boots, then yes of course I would have taken them off, but we were both completely dry. Not the friendliest of welcomes you would expect when staying at a B&B, especially when it advertises itself as a place for C2C’ers to stay at.
reviews.title: OK, Not what I really expected
